text: The Color of Pomegranates is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Parajanov.В гости к мастеру: Дому-музею Сергея Параджанова в Ереване – 30 летЦвет граната (1968) It stars Sofiko Chiaureli, Melkon Aleksanyan, and Vilen Galstyan. ==Actors== *Sofiko Chiaureli – Poet as a Youth/Poet's Love/Poet's Muse/Mime/Angel of Resurrection *Melkon Aleksanyan – Poet as a child (as Melkon Alekyan) *Vilen Galstyan – Poet in the cloister *Giorgi Gegechkori – Poet as an old man *Spartak Bagashvili – Poet's father *Medea Japaridze – Poet's mother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Parajanov
title: The Color of Pomegranates
